### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of lab at position(0.5, 0.5) connected to electricity network

### Copper plate mine at position(40.0, -82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace at position(40.0, -82.0) 
-  Furnace at position(45.0, -83.0) 
-  Furnace at position(42.0, -81.0) 
-  Furnace at position(45.0, -80.0) 
-  Furnace at position(40.0, -79.0) 
-  Burner mining drill at position(43.0, -84.0)

### Inserter and chest system at position(3.5, 0.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner inserter at position(3.5, 0.5) 
-  Chest at position(2.5, 0.5)

### Inserter and chest system at position(0.5, 3.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner inserter at position(0.5, 3.5) 
-  Chest at position(0.5, 2.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items into entities
-  Ensure the entity can accept the item being inserted before attempting insertion
-  Check the entity's inventory and fuel status to avoid insertion errors

### Errors when extracting items from entities
-  Ensure the entity contains the item being extracted before attempting extraction
-  Check the entity's inventory status to avoid extraction errors

### Errors when interacting with entities
-  Ensure the entity is in a valid state (e.g. not out of fuel, not full) before interacting with it
-  Check the entity's status and warnings to avoid interaction errors
